formalText: Her baby was removed and taken to foster care after the ambulance responded to her home last night.
She finds joy from fan favorite TV programs.
She is willing to see the therapist again and try the dialectical behavior therapy and a new medication
We will move over to the lab and check her blood work and run some tests before we begin her new medication
She was referred up from the emergency room.
She was brought in by ambulance last night after she was cutting her arms and overdosing on Tylenol.
She denies feeling suicidal today
Claims "Everybody leaves me" and is visibly upset about where her boyfriend is
When asked if she has attempted suicide before  of this was her first attempt, she said "
I've been it I've been in to have my arm stitched up and my stomach pumped a few times"
Her chart states that she has been on Depakote and Geodon and Abilify.
she says that "they suck and didn't work"
She couldn't get appointments for dialectical behavioral therapy
States, "I don't have good results with the meds and the therapist is a jerk"
She states "Sometimes I cut myself to feel the pain and release it in the past I cut too deep but got stitched up"
She states, "I might binge eat and spend but I don't drink or do drugs.
I don't drink like my dad"
Carl is her boyfriend
They have been together for a couple of months and have been living together for the last four and a half weeks.
She has four kids.
Her Mom died when she was 4 and her dad is a drunk.
She claims, "They've never helped me"
When asked to spell the word spread backwards, she was not able to
She repeated the 3 words horse basketball and car back at the end
